Name: Green Park
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE basil in base of shaker (just to bruise). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Lime green in colour under a frothy head, lemon fresh and botanical with gin, basil and a hint of celery.
History: Created in 2011 by Erik Lorincz white head bartender at The American Bar , The Savoy Hotel, London, England.
